summary: The legendary Goat Tower.  A quick roadside attraction for the intrepid adventurer.  Can you climb to the top and unlock its secrets?
descriptionHtml:
The Goat Tower is a (borderline) lore-friendly platform challenge just north of Rorikstead. See if you can jump your way to the top and find the key to get inside.

Once inside, you're welcome to use The Goatkeeper's Lodge as a player home. I don't want to give too much away, but it does include all the basic amenities. And a few extras...

NOTE: I have not thoroughly tested the 'player home' aspect of this mod, so you may want to be careful when using the containers, weapon rack, etc. The interior cell is navmeshed and companion-friendly (I think). It SHOULD all work just fine, but you never know.

Screenshots and comments are welcome.
author: Omniquinn
